title: Change

abstract: Changing all the time, it's the only thing you can be sure of.
description: Michelle Huynh's high school years were peppered with having to change schools. In that, she had to adjust to a new area, and more importantly, make new friends. In time, Michelle has learnt to see the changes she dreaded so much as a good thing.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001927; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; To be Catalogued; 2009
